mdRecord.dcterms:title: Delia / By Samuel Daniel. 1592
The complaint of Rosamond
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Collier, John Payne, 1789-1883
Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: ii p., reprint ([99] p.) [1] p. 22 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Introduction signed. J.P.C. [i.e. John Payne Collier]

Representation of original t.-p.: Delia. Contayning certayne sonnets: With the complaint of Rosamond. Aetas prima canat veneres postrema tumultus. At London, Printed by I.C. for Simon Waterson, dwelling in Paules church-yard, at the signe of the Crowne. 1592.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: [Reprints of early English literature: magenta series]
